comments.author: darewaller
comments.body: Quote from: ralle14 on April 11, 2023, 02:14:01 AMI'd suggest BitKong.com they're one of the few casinos that started out with just the tower game years back before it got popular. At first, I thought that was from bitkong as they had a similar design to their tower game.To save a few clicks here's the direct link to their tower game.https://bitkong.com/en/app/casino/defaultNice trivia. Didn't know that this game is an old game. All the time I thought it's just a new addition in the gambling world. This tower game fits better on Bitkong because of their theme and site name. It reminds me of that classic Mario vs Donkey Kong games where the mechanics of the game is also climbing on top. @OP I know stake dot com has it. Luckybird.io has this game as well. This game is starting to get popular lately so maybe other top sites do also have it. Despite of it I never tried this game yet because I'm not really impressed with its graphics and gameplay. The game also looks hard for me. It has the same vibe as mines. I'm really bad at them and I feel nervous on which tile will I pick.
